PARAMETER.NAME: apiURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URL Of the API to query

PARAMETER.NAME: key
PARAMETER.COMMENT: License Key

PARAMETER.NAME: model
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Classification model to use. It will define into which categories the text may be classified.

PARAMETER.NAME: categories
PARAMETER.COMMENT: List of prefixes of categories to which the classification is limited. Each value will be separated by '|'. All the categories that do not start with any of the prefixes specified in the list will not be taken account in the classification.

PARAMETER.NAME: title
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Descriptive title of the content

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: AnnotationSet with the input content

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Output Annotation Set

PARAMETER.NAME: verbose
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Verbose mode. Shows additional information about the classification.

PARAMETER.NAME: debug
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Debug variable for the GATE plugin

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Filter content by this expression. It allows format: Type.FeatureName or Type.FeatureName==FeatureValue

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: debug
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Debug variable for the GATE plugin

PARAMETER.NAME: key
PARAMETER.COMMENT: License Key

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: AnnotationSet with the input content

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Output Annotation Set

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Filter content by this expression. It allows format: Type.FeatureName or Type.FeatureName==FeatureValue

PARAMETER.NAME: apiURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URL Of the API to query

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: apiURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URL of the API

PARAMETER.NAME: key
PARAMETER.COMMENT: License key

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Input Annotation Set

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Output Annotation Set

PARAMETER.NAME: debug
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Debug variable for the GATE plugin

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Filter content by this expression. It allows format: Type.FeatureName or Type.FeatureName==FeatureValue

PARAMETER.NAME: unknownWords
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
This feature adds a stage to all the possible modes where, much like a spellchecker, the engine tries to find a suitable analysis to the unknown words resulted from the initial analysis assignment. It is specially useful to decrease the impact typos have in text analyses.
y: enabled n: disabled (default)

PARAMETER.NAME: ud
PARAMETER.COMMENT: User Defined Dictionary

PARAMETER.NAME: relaxedTypography
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
This parameter indicates how reliable the text to analyze is (as far as spelling, typography, etc. are concerned), and influences how strict the engine will be when it comes to take these factors into account in the analysis.
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: lang
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Language in which we want to perform the analysis

PARAMETER.NAME: dictionary
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Dictionaries to be used

PARAMETER.NAME: disambiguationLevel
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Disambiguation level applied.

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: Textalytics Spell, Grammar and Style Proofreading
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Textalytics Spell, Grammar and Style Proofreading

PARAMETER.NAME: apiURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URL Of the API to query

PARAMETER.NAME: key
PARAMETER.COMMENT: License Key

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Input Annotation Set

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Output Annotation Set

PARAMETER.NAME: debug
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Debug variable for the GATE plugin

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Filter content by this expression. It allows format: Type.FeatureName or Type.FeatureName==FeatureValue

PARAMETER.NAME: lang
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
It specifies the language in which the text must be analyzed. The current supported values are the following:
en: English es: Spanish it: Italian fr: French

PARAMETER.NAME: dictionary
PARAMETER.COMMENT: This parameter will specify the list of active dictionaries that will be used in the topic extraction

PARAMETER.NAME: manyErrors
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
Describes how it will behave when it finds sentences with many errors
0: Check for all 1: Group and ignore 2: Group and warn (default)

PARAMETER.NAME: prefixed
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
Smart detection of prefixed words
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: quotesOrItalics
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
Smart handling of words written in italics or with quotation marks
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: too_longSent
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
Warn of too-long sentences
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: properNouns
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
Smart detection of proper nouns
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: tautologyAndLanMisuse
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
Check tautology and language misuse
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: spacing
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
Check spacing
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: openingClosing
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
Verify the opening and closing of pairs of signs
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: punctuation
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
Check punctuation marks
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: foreign
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
Warn of foreign words to be avoided
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: confusion
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
Warn of confusion between terms
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: percentage
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
Warn of percentage signs (%) not spaced (Spanish only)
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: consonantRed
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
Warn of group consonant reduction (Spanish only)
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: apiURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URL of the API

PARAMETER.NAME: key
PARAMETER.COMMENT: License key

PARAMETER.NAME: model
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Sentiment model chosen. If no model is specified, the most adequate one will be detected automatically, based on the language of the text. The current available models are the following: es-general: Generic domain (Spanish) en-general: Generic domain (English) fr-general: Generic domain (French)

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Input Annotation Set

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Output Annotation Set

PARAMETER.NAME: debug
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Debug variable for the GATE plugin

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Filter content by this expression. It allows format: Type.FeatureName or Type.FeatureName==FeatureValue

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Filter content by this expression. It allows format: Type.FeatureName or Type.FeatureName==FeatureValue

PARAMETER.NAME: apiURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: URL of the API

PARAMETER.NAME: key
PARAMETER.COMMENT: License key

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Input Annotation Set

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Output Annotation Set

PARAMETER.NAME: debug
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Debug variable for the GATE plugin

PARAMETER.NAME: unknownWords
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
This feature adds a stage to the topic extraction in which the engine, much like a spellchecker, tries to find a suitable analysis to the unknown words resulted from the initial analysis assignment. It is specially useful to decrease the impact typos have in text analyses.
y: enabled n: disabled (default)

PARAMETER.NAME: relaxedTypography
PARAMETER.COMMENT:
This paramater indicates how reliable the text (as far as spelling, typography, etc. are concerned) to analyze is, and influences how strict the engine will be when it comes to take these factors into account in the topic extraction.
y: enabled (default) n: disabled

PARAMETER.NAME: lang
PARAMETER.COMMENT: It specifies the language in which the text must be analyzed.

PARAMETER.NAME: disambiguationLevel
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Disambiguation level applied.

PARAMETER.NAME: context
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Context prioritization for entity semantic disambiguation.

PARAMETER.NAME: udDictionaries
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Name of the User defined Dictionaries to be used

PARAMETER.NAME: caseSensitive
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Indicates if the concept extraction must be case sensitive.

PARAMETER.NAME: subTopics
PARAMETER.COMMENT: This parameter will indicate if subtopics are to be shown.

PARAMETER.NAME: topicTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Topic Types to detect

PARAMETER.NAME: timeref
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Time reference

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process
